name: Mojo Emoji Maja Rescue FREE
description:
One emoji to rescue them all!

Join Mojo Emoji on his rescue mission.
Mojo Emoji's cute little pink girl friend got lost in a crazy giant maze build by the ancient Emojis.
Our funny yellow fellow has to survive a bunch of levels, avoid dangerous spikes and collect a lot of extras to find his way to Maja and reach the final exit.
Hurry, Maja is in danger and waits for you. Don't be a wimp, be her hero!

Download now and let the fun begin!


HOW TO PLAY:
Touch the device to make Mojo jump.
Tilt device to left or right to make Mojo move left or right.
Collect all items.
Find the Maja and reach the next level.

FEATURES:
- 60 different and skilling Levels
- Accelerator controlled gameplay
- Full 64bit support
- Easy to play for all ages
- Share your success on Twitter
- Language free
